sources.title: THE SPEED KINGS (1913)
sources.description: THE SPEED KINGS Keystone-Mutual 1 reel, rel. Sept. 30, 1913 dir. Wilfred Lucas cast: Mabel Normand, Ford Sterling, Teddy Tetzlaff, Earl Cooper, Roscoe Arbuckle, Paul Jacobs Location: Santa Monica, CA

sources.title: The Speed Kings
sources.description: Plot taken from IMDb: Papa is taking his daughter Mabel (Normand) to an automobile race. Mabel is in love with Teddy Tetzlaff, but Papa prefers Earl Cooper, and he schemes to try to prevent Tetzlaff from winning the race. As the race begins, Papa and Mabel are watching it together with conflicting loyalties and strong emotions. Fatty Arbuckle appears as a race track official.

metadata.Plot: Papa is taking his daughter Mabel to an automobile race. Mabel is in love with Teddy Tetzlaff, but Papa prefers Earl Cooper, and he schemes to try to prevent Tetzlaff from winning the race. As the race begins, Papa and Mabel are watching it together with conflicting loyalties and strong emotions.
metadata.Actors: Roscoe 'Fatty' Arbuckle, Mabel Normand, Ford Sterling
